General.Name: Timah Resources Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Timah Resources Limited, through its subsidiary, Mistral Engineering Sdn Bhd., generates renewable energy in Australia and Malaysia. It owns and operates a biogas power plant with approximately 4.0 megawatts situated in Sabah, Malaysia. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in North Sydney, Australia. Timah Resources Limited is a subsidiary of Cash Nexus (M) Sdn. Bhd.

0.Name: Dr. King Thian  Mah AMP, DSSA, JP
0.Title: Exec. Chairman
